def_cn: 宝瓶宫，宝瓶座（黄道十二宫之一。出生于1月20日至2月18日之间的人属此星座）
def_en: Aquarius is one of the twelve signs of the zodiac. Its symbol is a person pouring water. People who are born approximately between 20th January and 18th February come under this sign.

def_cn: 出生于宝瓶宫时段的人
def_en: An Aquarius is a person whose sign of the zodiac is Aquarius.
